statements: DELETE FROM job_opportunities WHERE job_title = 'Software Engineer' AND company_name = 'Tech Company';
DELETE FROM job_opportunities WHERE id = 1 AND company_name = 'Tech Corp';
DELETE FROM job_opportunities WHERE salary > 70000 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM job_opportunities WHERE job_id = 101 AND company_name = 'ABC Company';
DELETE FROM skill_development_programs WHERE provider = 'XYZ Training' AND cost > 5000;
DELETE FROM skill_development_programs WHERE duration > 6 AND program_name = 'Advanced Java';
DELETE FROM individual_profile WHERE full_name = 'John Doe' AND email = 'john.doe@example.com';
DELETE FROM skills_programs WHERE program_type = 'Certification' AND provider_name = 'ABC Training Center'
DELETE FROM applicants WHERE desired_job_title = 'Software Engineer' AND desired_location = 'San Francisco';
